fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Stalk (Night): Follow a player. If their target is given any notifications at all, kill your target.
-Watch (Night): Stay at a playerâ€™s home and wait for someone. If your target is given any notifications, kill a random non-Unseen visitor.
-Guard (Night): Attack all non-Unseen visitors to you. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If your target kills you while using Stalk, you will be unable to kill them. This does not apply to Watch or Guard.
